page.title: 06Hadley Market
page.content:
Market day is here today A lot of people come to shop Rushing,pushing,shouting all day Kettles,saucepans going cheap Evening comes all is silent Tomorrow will be another quiet day.
Hadley Market is not all that busy,but it still has cheerful people shopping there.Cheerful people on the market stalls talk to each other happily.When customers come they are very pleased to see them.The salesmen and women are happy when their customers make nice remarks about the items for sale on their stalls.The atmosphere is noisy,cheerful friendly.
